SupportBlindsidePlayer.name: Blindside
SupportBlindsidePlayer.description: Supports Skills which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills are more likely to Critically Hit Blinded Enemies, and deal more Damage with Critical Hits against Blinded Enemies, but cannot themselves inflict Blind.

SupportCrescendoPlayer.name: Crescendo
SupportCrescendoPlayer.description: Supports Strikes that perform a Final Strike at the end of a combination of attacks, allowing you to use the Final Strike twice in succession.

SupportInnervatePlayer.name: Innervate
SupportInnervatePlayer.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself. Killing a Shocked enemy with supported skills infuses all of your Attacks with Lightning damage for a short time.

SupportCullingStrikePlayer.name: Culling Strike
SupportCullingStrikePlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills, causing them to Cull Rare and Unique Enemies on Hit.

SupportPursuitPlayer.name: Pursuit
SupportPursuitPlayer.description: Supports Melee Attacks. Supported Skills deal more Melee damage if you have struck with a Projectile Attack Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Projectile Damage.

SupportTwofoldPlayer.name: Twofold
SupportTwofoldPlayer.description: Supports any Skill that Consumes Charges, granting a chance for benefits of that Consumption to be doubled.

SupportCulminationPlayer.name: Culmination
SupportCulminationPlayer.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills gain Combo when you successfully Strike Enemies with other Melee Attacks. Supported Skills reset their Combo on use, dealing more Damage the higher Combo you had on use. Cannot support skills which already gain Combo. Cannot Support Skills used by Minions.

SupportLastingShockPlayer.name: Lasting Shock
SupportLastingShockPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies or inflicts Shock, causing its Shocks to be inflicted less often but last longer.

SupportDazedBreakPlayer.name: Break Posture
SupportDazedBreakPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Daze Enemies when they fully Break Armour.

SupportDazzlePlayer.name: Dazzle
SupportDazzlePlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills. Supported Skills always hit Dazed Enemies, but Consume Daze on Hit, and cannot themselves inflict Daze.

SupportLeveragePlayer.name: Leverage
SupportLeveragePlayer.description: Supports Skills which Hit Enemies. Supported Skills gain increased chance to Critically Hit against Immobilised Enemies.

SupportAdditionalAccuracyPlayer.name: Bullseye
SupportAdditionalAccuracyPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to gain Accuracy.

SupportDeadlyHeraldsPlayer.name: Deadly Herald
SupportDeadlyHeraldsPlayer.description: Supports Herald Skills, making their triggered effects deal more damage at the expense of higher Spirit cost.

SupportLifeFlaskPlayer.name: Life Bounty
SupportLifeFlaskPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Life Flask charges.

SupportDeadlyPoisonPlayer.name: Deadly Poison
SupportDeadlyPoisonPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent Poison.

SupportBurstingPlaguePlayer.name: Bursting Plague
SupportBurstingPlaguePlayer.description: Supports skills that can Poison enemies, causing Poisoned enemies to gain Plague over time and explode in a Plague Burst on death. Cannot support the skills of Minions.

SupportLifeOnCullPlayer.name: Life Drain
SupportLifeOnCullPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Life when it Culls an enemy.

SupportRetreatPlayer.name: Retreat
SupportRetreatPlayer.description: Supports Skills which create Projectiles. Supported Skills deal more damage with Projectiles if you have struck with a Melee Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Melee Damage.

SupportSlowerProjectilesPlayer.name: Deceleration
SupportSlowerProjectilesPlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel more slowly.

SupportLightningExposurePlayer.name: Lightning Exposure
SupportLightningExposurePlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to inflict Lightning Exposure when inflicting Shock.

PlagueBurstPlayer.name: Plague Burst
PlagueBurstPlayer.description: Triggered when an enemy Poisoned by a supported skill dies, dealing Physical damage around them based on the built-up Plague.

SupportMaimPlayer.name: Maim
SupportMaimPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Maim enemies.

SupportDelayedGratificationPlayer.name: Delayed Gratification
SupportDelayedGratificationPlayer.description: Supports Skills which require some Condition to be met for use. Supported Skills can be used an additional time after their Condition has been met, but meeting that Condition is harder.

SupportAddedLightningDamagePlayer.name: Lightning Infusion
SupportAddedLightningDamagePlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Gain Lightning Damage but deal less Cold and Fire Damage.

SupportMaladyPlayer.name: Malady
SupportMaladyPlayer.description: Supports Skills which can cause Damaging Hits, causing base chance to inflict Bleed with Supported Skills to instead apply to base chance to Poison, and causing base chance to Poison to instead apply to Bleed.

SupportSalvoPlayer.name: Salvo
SupportSalvoPlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which fire Projectiles. Supported Skills accumulate Seals over time, and consume them when used. For each Seal consumed, the Attack will fire additional Projectiles. Projectiles from Supported Skills are fired in random directions. Cannot Support Skills which require Combo, have a Cooldown or already gain Seals.

SupportDelayedReactionPlayer.name: Delayed Reaction
SupportDelayedReactionPlayer.description: Supports Skills which create Hazards, causing those Hazards to only be able to trigger immediately after creation or at the end of their duration. Created Hazards have significantly lowered duration, and deal more damage.

SupportManaFlaskPlayer.name: Mana Bounty
SupportManaFlaskPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Mana Flask charges.

SupportFasterAttackPlayer.name: Martial Tempo
SupportFasterAttackPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Attack faster.

SupportCadencePlayer.name: Cadence
SupportCadencePlayer.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills gain more Attack speed each time you use them, but will become unusable if used too frequently in a short time frame.

SupportFarCombatPlayer.name: Longshot
SupportFarCombatPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage from farther away.

SupportMobilityPlayer.name: Mobility
SupportMobilityPlayer.description: Supports skills that can be used while moving, allowing you to move faster while using them.

SupportSecondWindPlayer.name: Second Wind
SupportSecondWindPlayer.description:
Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown.
Cannot support instant or triggered skills.

SupportCaltropsPlayer.name: Caltrops
SupportCaltropsPlayer.description: Supports Ranged Spear Attacks. Supported Skills create Caltrops when Projectiles they create reach the end of their flight.

SupportElectrocutePlayer.name: Electrocute
SupportElectrocutePlayer.description: Supports any Skill which can deal Damage. Lightning Damage from Supported Skills can inflict Electrocute, but Supported Skills cannot inflict Shock.

SupportMomentumPlayer.name: Momentum
SupportMomentumPlayer.description: Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal more damage if you move a sufficient distance while using the skill. Teleportation does not count towards the distance travelled.

SupportShockingLeapPlayer.name: Shocking Leap
SupportShockingLeapPlayer.description: Supports Skills that leap into the air and deal damage, causing them to create Shocked Ground the first time they Critically Hit an enemy.

TriggeredCaltropsPlayer.description: Maims and deals Physical area damage when triggered by an Enemy. Caltrops are destroyed when triggered, and a maximum of 20 Caltrops can be active at once.

SupportEncumberancePlayer.name: Encumbrance
SupportEncumberancePlayer.description: Supports any skill, causing inflicted Slows to be more powerful.

SupportEmpoweredCullPlayer.name: Murderous Intent
SupportEmpoweredCullPlayer.description: Supports skills that can Empower skills other than themselves, causing skills they Empower to Cull enemies.

SupportSingleOutPlayer.name: Single Out
SupportSingleOutPlayer.description: Supports Mark Skills. Enemies affected by Supported Marks will have their Armour Broken by Physical Damage they take.

SupportChanceToPoisonPlayer.name: Envenom
SupportChanceToPoisonPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Poison enemies.

SupportWindowOfOpportunityPlayer.name: Window of Opportunity
SupportWindowOfOpportunityPlayer.description: Supports Channelling skills that have special effects if released with Perfect Timing, causing them to deal much more damage if released with Perfect Timing but reducing the Perfect Timing window.

SupportManaOnCullPlayer.name: Soul Drain
SupportManaOnCullPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Mana when it Culls an enemy.

SupportNeuralOverloadPlayer.name: Neural Overload
SupportNeuralOverloadPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies. Nearby enemies are marked when they are Primed for Electrocution, and hitting a marked enemy with a supported skill will Electrocute them.

SupportKnockbackWavePlayer.description: Supports any skill that you can use, triggering a blast of wind that Knocks Back enemies if you are Stunned while using it.

SupportWarmbloodedPlayer.name: Warm Blooded
SupportWarmbloodedPlayer.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing Freeze applied to you to last for a shorter duration while the Supported Skill is active.

SupportSpectralVolleyPlayer.name: Spectral Volley
SupportSpectralVolleyPlayer.description: Supports Bow or Spear Projectile Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills deal lower damage initially, but generate Spectral Projectiles, which deal more damage when they fire. Spectral Projectiles linger and will fire a short duration after no new Spectral Projectiles have been created. Cannot support Channelling Skills, Leaping skills, or skills which rain Projectiles from above.

SupportVoltPlayer.name: Volt
SupportVoltPlayer.description: Supports Projectile Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills gain Voltaic Charge as you move, up to a maximum. When used, Supported Skills expend that Charge to gain extra Lightning Damage and Chain.

SupportNimbleReloadPlayer.name: Nimble Reload
SupportNimbleReloadPlayer.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to Reload bolts significantly faster.

SupportUntouchablePlayer.name: Untouchable
SupportUntouchablePlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. While using Supported Skills, you gain increased Evasion Rating, with the increase scaling higher the longer the Attack time of the supported Skill. Cannot Support Channelling Skills.

SupportUnerringPowerPlayer.name: Unerring Power
SupportUnerringPowerPlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. When Supported Attacks are Empowered, they have significantly lowered cost and raised Accuracy.

SupportTumultPlayer.name: Tumult
SupportTumultPlayer.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills consume a Frenzy Charge on use to powerfully Break Armour.

SupportChainPlayer.name: Chain
SupportChainPlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills and any other skills that Chain, causing them to Chain additional times.

SupportFerocityPlayer.name: Ferocity
SupportFerocityPlayer.description: Supports Skills that you use yourself. Supported Skills will consume a Frenzy Charge on use if possible, and will gain significant Skill Speed if they do. Supported Skills cannot generate Frenzy Charges.

SupportFasterProjectilesPlayer.name: Acceleration
SupportFasterProjectilesPlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel faster.

SupportRicochetPlayer.name: Ricochet
SupportRicochetPlayer.description: Supports any Skill which creates Projectiles, giving those Projectiles a chance to Chain when impacting terrain.

SupportIncreaseLimitPlayer.name: Overabundance
SupportIncreaseLimitPlayer.description: Supports skills which can have a Limited number of effects active at once, increasing that Limit at the cost of their duration. Only applies to restrictions that use the word "Limit".

SupportStormchainPlayer.name: Stormchain
SupportStormchainPlayer.description: Supports Projectile Skills and Skills which can Chain. Supported Skills always Chain when initially Hitting a Shocked Enemy, but cannot themselves inflict Shock. Does not support Skills which cannot Chain.

SupportMultipleProjectilesPlayer.name: Scattershot
SupportMultipleProjectilesPlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills, making them fire extra Projectiles. Also lowers Attack and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.

SupportChargedShotsPlayer.name: Charged Shots
SupportChargedShotsPlayer.description: Supports Bow Attacks. Every third shot with Supported Skills restores a portion of it's Mana cost and Gains Damage as extra Lightning Damage.

SupportSwiftAfflictionPlayer.name: Swift Affliction
SupportSwiftAfflictionPlayer.description: Supports any skill that deals damage, causing it to deal more damage over time but have a shorter duration.

SupportOverchargePlayer.name: Overcharge
SupportOverchargePlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making its Shocks more effective but reflecting them back to you as well.

SupportFlowPlayer.name: Flow
SupportFlowPlayer.description: Supports Skills which require Combo to use. Supported Skills lose their Combo stacks after a longer delay spent not gaining any Combo.

SupportRetortPlayer.name: Retort
SupportRetortPlayer.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself, causing them to Consume the Parried Debuff on Hit to grant you a Frenzy Charge. Cannot support Skills which already Consume the Parried Debuff.

SupportRearmPlayer.name: Rearm
SupportRearmPlayer.description: Supports Skills which create Hazards. Hazards created by Supported Skills have a chance to be rearmed a short duration after triggering.

SupportCharmBountyPlayer.name: Charm Bounty
SupportCharmBountyPlayer.description: Supports any Skill that Hits Enemies, causing Enemies it kills to grant more Charm charges.

SupportForkPlayer.name: Fork
SupportForkPlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Fork.

SupportReachPlayer.name: Reach
SupportReachPlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills which deal Damage in an Area. Supported Skills have significantly increased Area of Effect, but are less Accurate against nearby targets.

SupportPunchThroughPlayer.name: Punch Through
SupportPunchThroughPlayer.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills apply Easy Target when Knocking Back Enemies, causing the next Projectile Attack Hit they take to deal increased Damage.

SupportCloseCombatPlayer.name: Close Combat
SupportCloseCombatPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage to enemies based on how close they are to you.

SupportMultipleChargesPlayer.name: Profusion
SupportMultipleChargesPlayer.description: Supports skills that can generate Charges, giving them a chance to generate an additional Charge when they do so.

SupportPayloadPlayer.name: Payload
SupportPayloadPlayer.description: Supports Skills which fire Grenades, giving fired Grenades a chance to activate again, but lengthening their cooldowns.

SupportPrecisionPlayer.name: Precision
SupportPrecisionPlayer.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Accuracy while the Skill is active.

SupportDeliberationPlayer.name: Deliberation
SupportDeliberationPlayer.description: Supports skills that can be used while moving, causing you to move slower while using them, but granting more damage in exchange.

SupportExcoriatePlayer.name: Excoriate
SupportExcoriatePlayer.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills deal more Melee Damage for each Elemental Ailment on Enemies they hit, but cannot themselves inflict Elemental Ailments.

SupportComboFinisherPlayer.name: Combo Finisher
SupportComboFinisherPlayer.description: Supports Melee Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills cannot be used until enough Combo has been built up, but deal massively more damage. Cannot support skills which already Combo, or Triggered Skills.

SupportPerfectionPlayer.name: Perfection
SupportPerfectionPlayer.description: Supports skills which have a benefit for Perfectly Timing their use. On successfully executing Perfect Timing with Supported Skills, gain Perfection, which is a powerful damage buff. However, failing to execute any Perfect Timing (even with skills not supported by Perfection) will remove all Perfection on you.

SupportPiercePlayer.name: Pierce
SupportPiercePlayer.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Pierce an enemy but deal less damage after doing so.

SupportPerpetualChargePlayer.name: Perpetual Charge
SupportPerpetualChargePlayer.description: Supports skills that consume Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charges on use, giving them a chance not to remove each Charge while still gaining the benefits of consuming them.

SupportAdherePlayer.name: Adhere
SupportAdherePlayer.description: Supports Grenade Skills. Grenades from Supported Skills do not bounce, instead halting movement where they intially land, but doing lower damage when they detonate.

SupportHitAndRunPlayer.name: Hit and Run
SupportHitAndRunPlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which do not already have some Condition for use. Supported Skills can only be used after you have moved a certain distance, but have massively increased Skill Speed. Cannot support Skills which have a Cooldown or that are Triggered.

SupportCommiseratePlayer.name: Commiserate
SupportCommiseratePlayer.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills inflict more powerful Ailments if you are afflicted with those Ailments when you inflict them, while also removing from you any Ailment that they inflict.

SupportOverextendPlayer.name: Overextend
SupportOverextendPlayer.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills deal more Damage with Critical Hits, but Critically Hitting an Enemy with them will Daze you for a short time.

SupportOutmaneuverPlayer.name: Outmaneuver
SupportOutmaneuverPlayer.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills Break Armour against Parried Enemies.

SupportAlignmentPlayer.name: Alignment
SupportAlignmentPlayer.description: Supports Bow Attacks. Supported Skills indicate one of four directions, changing indicated direction when an Attack with Supported Skill matches that direction. Attacks from Supported Skills which match the indicated direction deal much more Damage. Cannot Support Channelled Skills.

SupportImpalePlayer.name: Impale
SupportImpalePlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Impale on Hit but making them unable to Extract Impale themselves.

SupportMultiplePoisonPlayer.name: Comorbidity
SupportMultiplePoisonPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing it to inflict an extra Poison on enemies but shortening the duration of those Poisons.

SupportLockdownPlayer.name: Lockdown
SupportLockdownPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing any Pin buildup it inflicts to be stronger the closer the enemy is to you.

SupportGambleshotPlayer.name: Gambleshot
SupportGambleshotPlayer.description: Supports Skills which fire Projectiles that are not ground targeted. Projectiles from Supported Skills randomly Fork, Chain or Pierce.

SupportPinPlayer.name: Pin
SupportPinPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing its Physical damage to Pin enemies but making it unable to Stun.

SupportCooldownReductionPlayer.name: Ingenuity
SupportCooldownReductionPlayer.description: Supports skills with Cooldowns, increasing the rate at which those Cooldowns Recover.

SupportAmmoConservationPlayer.name: Ammo Conservation
SupportAmmoConservationPlayer.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, granting a chance to not consume a Bolt when firing.

SupportBloodInTheEyesPlayer.name: Blood in the Eyes
SupportBloodInTheEyesPlayer.description: Supports Skills that Hit Enemies, causing those Hits to Hobble Bleeding Enemies based on a portion of Physical Damage dealt.

SupportDazingPlayer.name: Discombobulate
SupportDazingPlayer.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to build up Daze based on a portion of Physical Damage dealt.

SupportChanceToShockPlayer.name: Conduction
SupportChanceToShockPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more likely to Shock.

SupportPracticedComboPlayer.name: Practiced Combo
SupportPracticedComboPlayer.description: Supports Strike Skills. Supported Skills have a chance to build additional Combo on Hit. Cannot support Skills used by Minions.

SupportInhibitorPlayer.name: Inhibitor
SupportInhibitorPlayer.description: Supports any Skill you use yourself or that you Trigger. Supported Skills cannot consume Charges by any means. Cannot Support Skills which require Charges to be used.

SupportBlindPlayer.name: Blind
SupportBlindPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing them to Blind on Hit.

SupportLightningPenetrationPlayer.name: Lightning Penetration
SupportLightningPenetrationPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making those Hits Penetrate enemy Lightning resistance.

SupportCorrosionPlayer.name: Corrosion
SupportCorrosionPlayer.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing Poison it applies to also Break enemy Armour. Cannot support skills that Consume Fully Broken Armour.
